title: LeBron James, Clyde Drexler, Cam Newton, Baker Mayfield, Tom Brady
itunes:title: LeBron James, Clyde Drexler, Cam Newton, Baker Mayfield, Tom Brady
description:
Colin explains why LeBron James is the MVP, his thoughts on Clyde Drexler's recent comments, why Cam Newton is still not signed, why this is Baker Mayfield's last chance, and why Patriots fans don't like the new Tom Brady. Guests include Mark Medina, David Shaw, Rob Parker, and Eric Mangini.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
